embedCodes.1602486942460960776:
Patch 12.23b changes (coming out on Wednesday 14th).

We're opting to go more nerf heavy this patch to address some of the balance outliers. More on specifics tomorrow. Some champs are getting Riot special, but those that are, we think have viable alternatives that are balanced pic.twitter.com/sZQgo9mxkp

— Matt Leung-Harrison (@RiotPhroxzon) December 12, 2022
embedCodes.1601257231923777539:
Going to keep monitoring as things settle. The map changes were intended to make 5 squishy poke comps less oppressive. Front liners have a real role in ARAM.
We hear frustration around the vision blocking and hexgate return, and are actively monitoring for the effect on the game

— Riot Maxw3ll (@ExasperatedDan) December 9, 2022
embedCodes.1601256598504177664:
ARAM check in:
Melee champs are stronger and poke champs are weaker. This was intended but we overshot. Prepping a micro patch to go out on the biggest outliers.
Tracking sentiment around terrain rubble/hexgates to see what follow up is necessary.

— Riot Maxw3ll (@ExasperatedDan) December 9, 2022
embedCodes.1600595210932785160:
The recent ARAM updates were our priority for live modes work and we have plans for other areas both old and new. We will have a more detailed update on what caused the incident, as well as the future of modes for League early next year.

— League of Legends Dev Team (@LoLDev) December 7, 2022
embedCodes.1600595209305395203:
We know this is not the news you were hoping for, as players have been asking for the return of NB, and we apologize for being unable to make that happen for right now.

— League of Legends Dev Team (@LoLDev) December 7, 2022
embedCodes.1600595207728283652:
That means the amount of work to fix NB will take longer than we had hoped, and isn't something we were able to complete in time for the end of 2022. So we had to make the call to not run it.

— League of Legends Dev Team (@LoLDev) December 7, 2022
embedCodes.1600595202653229062:
Since we made the original promise in 2021 to bring back NB, the League team lost some key people that would’ve been involved in this. Rehiring for roles and onboarding new members takes time that impacts respective projects.

— League of Legends Dev Team (@LoLDev) December 7, 2022
embedCodes.1600595200807763968:
While we previously announced that we would end the year with Nexus Blitz, we’re not going to be able to bring it back at this time. Unfortunately pieces of the NB UI experience were broken by unrelated work on a different part of the game.

— League of Legends Dev Team (@LoLDev) December 7, 2022

The Jax midscope update will be showing up on PBE tomorrow (12/2). Planned patch is 13.1. Feedback is welcome!

Jax's update is on the smaller side and mainly focused on making his ult more exciting/interesting to cast. We're also bumping up his AP build for burst enthusiasts! pic.twitter.com/4XYBfMSdas

embedCodes.1597661492962263048:
Thanks to everyone who's been checking out ARAM! Don't want to change too much given the coming map changes, but we want to loosen up the Heartsteel meta that's been forming. This will be shipping in 12.23:

Heartsteel
Permanent Health Gained (ARAM only): 10% damage dealt >> 5%

— Riot Maxw3ll (@ExasperatedDan) November 29, 2022
embedCodes.1597424978126946304:
Systems seem ~right, so we're doing champ changes. Tanks are weak, barring individual outlier synergy with items, so we're buffing them (over items) to avoid poaching.

JGL changes for balance & feel

Obj Planning: pinging spawn timer won't trigger a vote & autofire disabled pic.twitter.com/tC4RmuyRKc

— Matt Leung-Harrison (@RiotPhroxzon) November 29, 2022
embedCodes.1595207964037906433:
Hey again friends.

After further investigation, we are planning to reverse punishments that occurred as a result of the bug in our disruptive speech detection last week.

Apologies for the radio silence here, wanted to make sure our 🦆’s were in a row before we talked about it.

— Jordan Checkman (@CestDommage) November 23, 2022
embedCodes.1594790889955930113:
FYI around League’s new detection systems:
- We had a bug fixed before the weekend that made things slightly more aggressive than intended
- Very few players were negatively impacted
- If you believe you received a punishment in error, please contact player support!

— Jordan Checkman (@CestDommage) November 21, 2022
embedCodes.1593406435131523072:
Pushing a hotfix to ARAM, looking for more data on levers and to reign in some outliers (1/2):

Akali: 115% Dmg Dealt >> 110%
Ashe: 0 Bonus Attack Speed Scaling >> 2.5%
Kalista: 0 Bonus AS Scaling >> 2.5%
Kayn: 100% Healing >> 80%
Kha’zix: 115% Dmg Dealt >> 110% Dmg Dealt

— Riot Maxw3ll (@ExasperatedDan) November 18, 2022
